item.description:
Let go see a Musical together at the starts of the summer.

"Share the fun and laughter at this feel-good comedy as five girlfriends go from heartbreak to happiness during a wild night of karaoke. The five women relive their past, celebrate their present and look forward to their future while belting such hits as "Lady Marmalade," "It's Raining Men," "Man, I Feel Like a Woman," "I Will Survive" and many more!"

Dinner prior to show is TBA when the time is near.  

Tickets are $28 on Gold Star vs the $38 regular price. May run out soon so buy it early if you want to come. 

Click on the link below to get the ticket to be seated together:

http://www.goldstar.com/groups/3dabfdee7e86f00cbea6b117917692101aa40d8f.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Girls Night: The Musical
